info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:05PM PDT until August 24 at 5:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM PDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SAN BERNARDINO COUNTY... At 505 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles southeast of Amboy, or 32 miles northeast of Twentynine Palms, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central San Bernardino County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
